description: Canonical product/listing model. Represents a sellable item across all marketplaces.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: Seller's internal SKU. This is the primary identifier in our system.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Product title/name as displayed on the marketplace.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Full product description. HTML is allowed for Rakuten, plain text for Amazon.

fields.name: marketplace_product_id
fields.description: Marketplace-native product ID: ASIN (Amazon), legacy item ID (eBay), ItemUrl slug (Rakuten).

fields.name: images
fields.description: Ordered list of image URLs. First image is the main image.

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: Key-value product attributes (size, color, material, etc.). Marketplace-specific attribute names are normalised here.

fields.name: condition
fields.description: Product condition. Map marketplace-specific condition strings to this set.

fields.name: marketplace_category_id
fields.description: Marketplace-specific category/genre ID. Required for listing creation but not stored long-term.

fields.name: is_active
fields.description: Whether the product is currently listed and visible on the marketplace.
